AbilityDef.label: berserk
AbilityDef.description: Activate Militech berserk. User becomes invulnerable to physical damage, deals more damage and moves faster.

AbilityDef.label: berserk
AbilityDef.description: Activate Zetatech berserk. User becomes highly resistant to physical damage and attacks faster.

AbilityDef.label: berserk
AbilityDef.description: Activate BioDyne berserk. User becomes highly resistant to physical damage, attacks faster and hits harder.

AbilityDef.label: berserk
AbilityDef.description: Activate Moore Tech berserk. User becomes highly resistant to physical damage.

AbilityDef.label: sandevistan
AbilityDef.description: Activate Militech "Apogee" sandevistan. Time appears to be slowed down by 85% for the user, while they are not slowed. From an outside perspective, they appear to move 567% faster, and seem to disappear. *Automatic weapons do not have their cyclic rate increased. Due to extremely high aiming and cooldown speed increases, it may be preferable to use single-shot or low burst weapons with this.

AbilityDef.label: sandevistan
AbilityDef.description: Activate Militech "Falcon" sandevistan. Time appears to be slowed down by 70% for the user, while they are not slowed. From an outside perspective, they appear to move 233% faster.

AbilityDef.label: sandevistan
AbilityDef.description: Activate QianT "Warp Dancer" sandevistan, tier 5. Incoming damage is reduced, and time appears to be slowed down by 20% for the user, while they are not slowed. From an outside perspective, they appear to move 25% faster.

AbilityDef.label: sandevistan
AbilityDef.description: Activate Dynalar sandevistan, tier 5. Time appears to be slowed down by 50% for the user, while they are not slowed. From an outside perspective, they appear to move twice as fast.

AbilityDef.label: sandevistan
AbilityDef.description: Activate Zetatech sandevistan, tier 5. Time appears to be slowed down by 30% for the user, while they are not slowed. From an outside perspective, they appear to move 43% faster.

AbilityDef.Name: ActivateQuickhack
AbilityDef.label: activate quickhack
AbilityDef.description: Activate a quickhack.

ThingDef.Name: QuickhackExplosionThingBase
ThingDef.label: blast
ThingDef.description: A blast caused by a quickhack

AbilityDef.label: overheat
AbilityDef.description: Overloads sensitive components within the target, causing a blast of heat.

AbilityDef.label: overheat
AbilityDef.description: Overloads sensitive components within the target, causing a blast of heat. Paraline variant, gains increased radius, increases target's vulnerability and uploads instantly.

AbilityDef.label: overheat
AbilityDef.description: Overloads sensitive components within the target, causing a blast of heat. Sigma variant, reveals a major physical vulnerability and recharges twice as fast.

AbilityDef.label: overheat
AbilityDef.description: Overloads sensitive components within the target, causing a blast of heat. Microcyber variant, instant upload with increased radius.

AbilityDef.label: overheat
AbilityDef.description: Overloads sensitive components within the target, causing a blast of heat. Rippler variant, gains increased radius.

AbilityDef.label: overheat
AbilityDef.description: Overloads sensitive components within the target, causing a blast of heat. Netdriver variant, gains increased radius, reveals a major physical vulnerability and recharges twice as fast.

AbilityDef.label: short circuit
AbilityDef.description: Overloads circuitry within the target, causing a burst of electromagnetic energy.

ThingDef.label: EMP burst
ThingDef.description: An electromagnetic pulse caused by a circuitry overload

AbilityDef.label: short circuit
AbilityDef.description: Overloads circuitry within the target, causing a burst of electromagnetic energy. Paraline variant, gains significantly increased radius, increases target's vulnerability and uploads instantly.

ThingDef.description: An electromagnetic pulse caused by a circuitry overload

AbilityDef.label: contagion
AbilityDef.description: Hacks safeguards that prevent toxic metal from implants or other sources from slipping into the bloodstream, putting the targets into a nauseated state.

AbilityDef.label: contagion
AbilityDef.description: Hacks safeguards that prevent toxic metal from implants or other sources from slipping into the bloodstream, putting the targets into a nauseated state. Paraline variant, gains increased radius, increases targets' vulnerability and uploads instantly.

AbilityDef.label: contagion
AbilityDef.description: Hacks safeguards that prevent toxic metal from implants or other sources from slipping into the bloodstream, putting the targets into a nauseated state. Sigma variant, reveals major physical vulnerabilities and recharges twice as fast.

AbilityDef.label: contagion
AbilityDef.description: Hacks safeguards that prevent toxic metal from implants or other sources from slipping into the bloodstream, putting the targets into a nauseated state. Microcyber variant, gains increased radius and uploads instantly.

AbilityDef.label: contagion
AbilityDef.description: Hacks safeguards that prevent toxic metal from implants or other sources from slipping into the bloodstream, putting the targets into a nauseated state. Netdriver variant, gains increased duration, reveals major physical vulnerabilities and recharges twice as fast.

AbilityDef.label: synapse burnout
AbilityDef.description: Overloads the target's synapses with pain signals, causing them to temporarily drop into pain shock.

AbilityDef.label: synapse burnout
AbilityDef.description: Overloads the target's synapses with pain signals, causing them to temporarily drop into pain shock. Paraline variant, gains increased duration, increases target's vulnerability and uploads instantly.

AbilityDef.label: synapse burnout
AbilityDef.description: Overloads the target's synapses with pain signals, causing them to temporarily drop into pain shock. Sigma variant, reveals a major physical vulnerability and recharges twice as fast.

AbilityDef.label: synapse burnout
AbilityDef.description: Overloads the target's synapses with pain signals, causing them to temporarily drop into pain shock. Netdriver variant, reveals a major physical vulnerability and recharges twice as fast.

AbilityDef.label: reboot optics
AbilityDef.description: Forces the target's optics to reboot, blinding them for 15 seconds.

AbilityDef.label: reboot optics
AbilityDef.description: Forces the target's optics to reboot, blinding them for 15 seconds. Paraline variant, increases target's vulnerability and uploads instantly.

AbilityDef.label: reboot optics
AbilityDef.description: Forces the target's optics to reboot, blinding them for 15 seconds. Rippler variant, affects a wide area and increases targets' vulnerability.

AbilityDef.label: cyberware malfunction
AbilityDef.description: Overloads a target's cyberware with false data, causing it to glitch and misfire.

AbilityDef.label: cyberware malfunction
AbilityDef.description: Overloads a target's cyberware with false data, causing it to glitch and misfire. Paraline variant, increases target's vulnerability and uploads instantly.

AbilityDef.label: cripple movement
AbilityDef.description: Impairs target's legs, inhibiting their movement.

AbilityDef.label: cripple movement
AbilityDef.description: Impairs target's legs, inhibiting their movement. Paraline variant, increases target's vulnerability and uploads instantly.

AbilityDef.label: cripple movement
AbilityDef.description: Impairs target's legs, inhibiting their movement. Microcyber variant, gains a small area of effect and uploads instantly.

AbilityDef.label: Weapon Glitch
AbilityDef.description: Causes target's ranged weapon to malfunction, dramatically reducing accuracy and rate of fire.

AbilityDef.label: Weapon Glitch
AbilityDef.description: Causes target's ranged weapon to malfunction, dramatically reducing accuracy and rate of fire. Paraline variant, increases target's vulnerability and uploads instantly.

AbilityDef.label: Weapon Glitch
AbilityDef.description: Causes target's ranged weapon to malfunction, dramatically reducing accuracy and rate of fire. Microcyber variant, gains a small area of effect and uploads instantly.

AbilityDef.label: Weapon Glitch
AbilityDef.description: Causes target's ranged weapon to malfunction, dramatically reducing accuracy and rate of fire. Rippler variant, affects a wide area and increases targets' vulnerability.

AbilityDef.label: bait
AbilityDef.description: Commands the target to approach the user's location.

AbilityDef.label: bait
AbilityDef.description: Commands the target to approach the user's location. Shadow variant, recharges much faster.

AbilityDef.label: bait
AbilityDef.description: Commands the target to approach the user's location. Netdriver variant, recharges twice as fast.

AbilityDef.label: request backup
AbilityDef.description: Commands multiple targets to approach the user's location.

AbilityDef.label: request backup
AbilityDef.description: Commands multiple targets to approach the user's location. Microcyber variant, has a very wide area of effect. Take care not to accidentally command yourself.

AbilityDef.label: memory wipe
AbilityDef.description: Prevents the enemy from noticing the target for a short duration. Can target self.

AbilityDef.label: memory wipe
AbilityDef.description: Prevents the enemy from noticing the target for a short duration. Can target self. Shadow variant, recharges faster.

AbilityDef.label: memory wipe
AbilityDef.description: Prevents the enemy from noticing the target for a short duration. Can target self. Netdriver variant, lasts longer and recharges very quickly.

AbilityDef.label: sonic shock
AbilityDef.description: Creates a feedback loop in the target's sensory processors. Extremely distracting. Not painful in and of itself, but does amplify existing sources of pain.

AbilityDef.label: sonic shock
AbilityDef.description: Creates a feedback loop in the target's sensory processors. Extremely distracting. Not painful in and of itself, but does amplify existing sources of pain. Paraline variant, increases target's vulnerability and uploads instantly.

AbilityDef.label: sonic shock
AbilityDef.description: Creates a feedback loop in the target's sensory processors. Extremely distracting. Not painful in and of itself, but does amplify existing sources of pain. Microcyber variant, gains a small area of effect and uploads instantly.

AbilityDef.label: sonic shock
AbilityDef.description: Creates a feedback loop in the target's sensory processors. Extremely distracting. Not painful in and of itself, but does amplify existing sources of pain. Shadow variant, recharges much faster.

AbilityDef.label: sonic shock
AbilityDef.description: Creates a feedback loop in the target's sensory processors. Extremely distracting. Not painful in and of itself, but does amplify existing sources of pain. Netdriver variant, recharges twice as fast.

AbilityDef.label: cyberpsychosis
AbilityDef.description: Scrambles the target's senses, causing them to lose control and attack anyone in sight.

AbilityDef.label: cyberpsychosis
AbilityDef.description: Scrambles the target's senses, causing them to lose control and attack anyone in sight. Shadow variant, recharges significantly faster.

AbilityDef.label: suicide
AbilityDef.description: Compels the target to stick some iron in their mouth and pull the trigger.

ThingDef.label: suicidal compulsion
ThingDef.description: A suicidal compulsion has taken over this person's motor system, and is forcing them to stick some iron in their mouth and pull the trigger.

AbilityDef.label: system collapse
AbilityDef.description: Disables the target's nervous system, knocking them out without making a sound.

AbilityDef.label: system collapse
AbilityDef.description: Disables the target's nervous system, knocking them out without making a sound. Shadow variant, recharges significantly faster.

AbilityDef.label: detonate grenade
AbilityDef.description: Hacks a target's grenade, causing it to spontaneously ignite.

ThingDef.label: grenade
ThingDef.description: A live grenade, about to explode.

AbilityDef.label: detonate grenade
AbilityDef.description: Hacks a target's grenade, causing it to spontaneously ignite. Paraline variant, gains increased radius, increases target's vulnerability and uploads instantly.

ThingDef.label: grenade
ThingDef.description: A live grenade, about to explode.

AbilityDef.label: detonate grenade
AbilityDef.description: Hacks a target's grenade, causing it to spontaneously ignite.

ThingDef.label: grenade
ThingDef.description: A live grenade, about to explode.

AbilityDef.label: blackwall gateway
AbilityDef.description: Summons a Blackwall archotech to infest the targets. The archotech will use their components to conduct an energy experiment. Their senses will also be overwhelmed by excruciating pain, though this is purely an unintended side effect. Upon completion, the archotech's experiment will consume the area in a devastating localized antimatter blast.

ThingDef.label: blackwall corruption
ThingDef.description: A Blackwall archotech has produced an unstable grain of antimatter, soon to annihilate and consume everything in the area.

AbilityDef.label: power leap
AbilityDef.description: Leap to a nearby location using boosted leg muscle reflexes.

AbilityDef.label: charged jump
AbilityDef.description: Jump to a nearby location.

AbilityDef.label: optical camo
AbilityDef.description: Use the optical camo to render the user impossible to locate in visible spectrum light.

AbilityDef.label: Projectile Launch System
AbilityDef.description: Shoot a missile which explodes upon impact.
